metadata.title: CVE-2023-39327 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenJPEG. Maliciously constructed pictures can causethe program to enter a large loop and continuously print warning messageson the terminal.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
